attributes.action: allow the newly restored Avro Vulcan XH558 to fly at the 2012 Olympics with the Red Arrows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In addition to the Red Arrows, the Vulcan is very a British symbol and NOT unsuitable for the 2012 Olympics because of the ridiculous notion of being ‘too British’!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
